subject: Corel, Autodesk
body:
Only learn to seize good fortune, for good fortune's always here.

Where there is much light, the shadow is deep.

Some books are undeservedly forgotten none are undeservedly remembered.

The rose speaks of love silently, in a language known only to the heart.

Books are the bees which carry the quickening pollen from one to another mind.

Look a man in the eye and say what you really think, don't just smile at him and say what you're supposed to think.

All true language is incomprehensible, like the chatter of a beggar's teeth.

Government is like a baby. An alimentary canal with a big appetite at one end and no sense of responsibility at the other.

Procrastination is one of the most common and deadliest of diseases and its toll on success and happiness is heavy.

My imagination is a monastery and I am its monk.

The upshot was, my paintings must burn that English artists might finally learn.

A paranoiac, like a poet, is born, not made.

No one will do it for you.
